full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHE BA JANG 'JONG WANG GI DGE BSGOS TZAS SANG NANG SO CHOS 'PHEL ZHES BYA BA, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I MDZAD PA'I BZLOG BSGYUR SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I NGOR ^DE LAS RGYAS PA ZHIG GYIS ZHES BSKUL BA LA DOM LTOG PAR, DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MO'I THA SHAL PA BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS PA'I NYES TSOGS KUN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS BYAMS SHING BZOD PA GSOL 'ON KYANG GANG GYIS PA KUN LA 'PHAN PA DANG BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,)
